```r
cal <- menu %>% 
  select(Category,
         Item,
         Calories) %>% 
  group_by(Category)  



cal_plot <- cal %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Calories,
             Category,
             fill = Category)) + 
  geom_boxplot() + 
  theme_classic() + 
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = \Set1\") + ggtitle(\"Calorie Content per Menu Category\")
